A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm surprised to see how divided people are on this movie. I'm a lifelong Star Wars fan and really enjoyed it. The more I watch it the more I enjoy it. I have a feeling that this movie will be reviewed more positively in the eyes of it audience as time goes by and people realize that the characters and plot went in a different direction to what they had imagined and that this was okay to happen.
